import React, { useState } from "react"; import { TabContent, TabPane, Nav, NavItem, NavLink, Button, Row, Col, } from "reactstrap"; import { Table } from "reactstrap"; import { Form, FormGroup, Label, Input } from "reactstrap"; import classnames from "classnames"; import "./reacher-helper.css"; import axios from "axios"; const ReacherHelper = (props) => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState("1"); const toggle = (tab) => { if (activeTab !== tab) setActiveTab(tab); }; var username = localStorage.getItem("username"); var username_modified = username.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + username.slice(1); axios.get("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/users/").then((response) => { for (var i = 0; i < response.data.length; i++) { if (response.data[i].username === username) { localStorage.setItem("id", response.data[i].id); console.log(response.data[i].id, response.data[i].username); } } }); var id = localStorage.getItem("id"); return (
So what do you feel like doing today {username_modified} {id}?
